subject: Coronavirus pandemic
title: What are the travel rules for France, the US, and other popular destinations?
article: Foreign travel is now easier for people in the UK than at any time since the beginning of the pandemic. However, there are still regulations about who can enter most countries, restrictions on what you can do when you get there, and rules to follow when you return home. These can change quickly, so it's important to keep checking theForeign Office guidance and tourist information for your destination before you go.Here are some key things to know about travelling to popular destinations.
